main event: A USAF pilot and ground crew observed a cigar-shaped object with a reddish glow in Heyford, England on October 2, 1954.
interesting points: The object exhibited an erratic flight path changing direction and altitude abruptly.,The object was estimated to be traveling at speeds of 400 to 600 MPH.,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes.,The sky was clear with good visibility at the time of the observation.,The sighting was reported by both a pilot and ground crew simultaneously.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object with a reddish glow
